bug.author: benhachey
bug.description:
Maybe by design, but it breaks the examples at <denchmark-link:https://alpha.spacy.io/docs/usage/saving-loading>https://alpha.spacy.io/docs/usage/saving-loading</denchmark-link>
spaCy/spacy/tokens/doc.pyx
Line 663 in c013e59
self.from_bytes(bytes_data, **exclude)

comments.comment: Thanks, well spotted! This is definitely a typo. Fixing!
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
